overview: Three beautiful Space Babes find themselves stranded on Earth when their spaceship runs out of energy after a dangerous encounter with their mortal enemies, the Scrotes. Once they discover human sexual arousal can recharge their ship, they accept the help of a lonely farm boy to harness energy at a local strip club and get back home â€” all while avoiding the nasty Scrotes.
tagline: Truly out of this world... likely out of your league.
title: Space Babes from Outer Space
